developer__analyze.description: Analyze code structure in 3 modes: 1) Directory overview - file tree with LOC/function/class counts to max_depth. 2) File details - functions, classes, imports. 3) Symbol focus - call graphs across directory to max_depth.

developer__image_processor.description: Process an image file from disk. Resizes if needed, converts to PNG, and returns as base64 data.

developer__list_windows.description: List all available window titles that can be used with screen_capture.

developer__screen_capture.description: Capture a screenshot of a specified display or window.

developer__shell.description: Execute a command in the shell.

developer__text_editor.description: Perform text editing operations on files. Commands: view, write, str_replace, insert, undo_edit.

computercontroller__automation_script.description: Create and run small PowerShell or Batch scripts for automation tasks.

computercontroller__cache.description: Manage cached files and data: list, view, delete cached files.

computercontroller__computer_control.description: Control the computer using Windows system automation.

computercontroller__docx_tool.description: Process DOCX files to extract text and create/update documents.

computercontroller__pdf_tool.description: Process PDF files to extract text and images.

computercontroller__web_scrape.description: Fetch and save content from a web page.

computercontroller__xlsx_tool.description: Process Excel (XLSX) files to read and manipulate spreadsheet data.

memory__remember.description: Stores a memory with optional tags in a specified category.

memory__retrieve.description: Retrieves all memories from a specified category.

memory__clear_category.description: Removes all memories within a specified category.

memory__forget.description: Removes a specific memory within a specified category.

tutorial__load_tutorial.description: Load a specific tutorial by name.

autovisualiser__render_sankey.description: Show a Sankey diagram from flow data.

autovisualiser__render_radar.description: Show a radar chart (spider chart) for multi-dimensional data comparison.

autovisualiser__render_donut.description: Show pie or donut charts for categorical data visualization.

autovisualiser__render_treemap.description: Show a treemap visualization for hierarchical data.

autovisualiser__render_chord.description: Show a chord diagram visualization for relationships and flows between entities.

autovisualiser__render_map.description: Show an interactive map visualization with location markers.

autovisualiser__render_mermaid.description: Show a Mermaid diagram from Mermaid syntax.

autovisualiser__show_chart.description: Show interactive line, scatter, or bar charts.

todo__todo_write.description: Write and manage task lists for tracking progress.

chatrecall__chatrecall.description: Search past conversations and load session summaries.

skills__loadSkill.description: Load and view skills from skills directories.

extensionmanager__search_available_exten.description: Discover available extensions that can be enabled.
